A Trooper with this Special Skill possesses enhanced response implants, which provide him with a better reaction capability.

{{css_skillbox |black| NEUROCINETICS | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}
{{effects}}
* During the '''[[Active Turn]]''', the [[Burst]] (B) value of all the BS Weapons of this Trooper is reduced to 1.
* During the '''[[Reactive Turn]]''', Neurocinetics allows the Trooper to use the whole Burst (B) value of their BS Weapons against a single target. 
* Any MOD to B only applies in the Reactive Turn.
{{css_skillbox-end}}
